name: email_checker
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool disposable_email_checker.
Tool description: Email Validation Service.check if a certain e-mail address is valid. Is it a valid domain? Is the e-mail a temporary/disposable e-mail? Our API contain 100k disposable email domains and give most valid email
API description: check the email provided by user for registration is valid or not or may be disposable email.

email.description: The email address to be verified.
